name: NAFANUA
description:
Nafanua is a short yet challenging 2D beat em up style game developed using Game Maker 8.1. You as a player control a lone tribeswoman set with the task of eliminating as many creatures as possible before time runs out.

The game was developed with a short yet rewarding arcade experience in mind.

Key Features:

-Clear pixel art style

-Highscore table to keep track of your kills

-Easy to learn, difficult to master gameplay

-Hidden achievements (Can you earn them all?)

Info:

-Release Date: 23/06/2016

-Platform: Microsoft Windows

-Price: Free

Bio:

I am a budding game artist currently studying a Bachelor in Creative Technology at Media Design School NZ.

Nafanua will hopefully be the first game of an extensive library of projects i hope to work on in the future.
